trans-unit.source: Represents a device-specific filter to be applied to the application.
trans-unit.target: 表示要应用到应用程序特定于设备的筛选器。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: This class corresponds to the `<filter>` element for the `<deviceFilters>` section of the ASP.NET settings schema.
trans-unit.target: 此类对应于`<filter>`元素`<deviceFilters>`ASP.NET 设置架构的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A filter can be either a comparison filter or an evaluator filter.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器可以比较筛选器或计算器筛选器。

trans-unit.source: Comparison-based filters compare a value specified by the developer to the current value of a device capability at run time.
trans-unit.target: 基于比较的筛选器开发人员指定的设备功能的当前值在运行时的值进行比较。

trans-unit.source: The evaluator (or delegate-based) filter uses a method from a programmer-specified class to perform the evaluation.
trans-unit.target: 计算器 （或基于委托的） 筛选器使用的程序员指定类的方法来执行计算。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Mobile.DeviceFilterElement"></xref> class as a comparison filter.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Mobile.DeviceFilterElement"></xref>作为比较筛选器的类。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used to create a comparison filter.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数用于创建比较筛选器。

trans-unit.source: The name by which the evaluator will be identified.
trans-unit.target: 将用来标识计算器名称。

trans-unit.source: The capability evaluated by the comparison evaluator.
trans-unit.target: 由比较计算器计算的功能。

trans-unit.source: The argument against which the capability should be compared.
trans-unit.target: 功能应与之比较自变量。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Mobile.DeviceFilterElement"></xref> class as an evaluator filter.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Mobile.DeviceFilterElement"></xref>类作为计算筛选器。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: This is the constructor for the evaluator (or delegate-based) filter.
trans-unit.target: 这是构造函数，该计算器 （或基于委托的） 筛选器。

trans-unit.source: The name by which the evaluator will be identified.
trans-unit.target: 将用来标识计算器名称。

trans-unit.source: The class type that contains the evaluator delegate.
trans-unit.target: 包含该计算器的类类型的委托。

trans-unit.source: The method in `filterClass` that is the evaluator delegate.
trans-unit.target: 中的方法`filterClass`即计算器委托。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the argument against which the capability should be compared.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应与之比较功能的自变量。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in comparison filters.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于比较筛选器。

trans-unit.source: The argument against which the capability should be compared.
trans-unit.target: 功能应与之比较自变量。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the capability evaluated by the comparison evaluator.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由比较计算器计算的功能。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: This property is used in comparison filters.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于比较筛选器。

trans-unit.source: The capability evaluated by the comparison evaluator.
trans-unit.target: 由比较计算器计算的功能。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the class type that contains the evaluator delegate.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含计算器委托的类类型。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in evaluator (or delegate-based) filters.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是使用计算器中 （或基于委托的） 筛选器。

trans-unit.source: The class type that contains the evaluator delegate.
trans-unit.target: 包含该计算器的类类型的委托。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method in the class specified by the <xref:System.Web.Mobile.DeviceFilterElement.FilterClass*> property that is used as the evaluator delegate.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的方法中指定的类<xref:System.Web.Mobile.DeviceFilterElement.FilterClass*>用作计算器委托的属性。</xref:System.Web.Mobile.DeviceFilterElement.FilterClass*>

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: This property is used in evaluator (or delegate-based) filters.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是使用计算器中 （或基于委托的） 筛选器。

trans-unit.source: The method in <xref:System.Web.Mobile.DeviceFilterElement.FilterClass*> that is the evaluator delegate.
trans-unit.target: 中的方法<xref:System.Web.Mobile.DeviceFilterElement.FilterClass*>即计算器委托。</xref:System.Web.Mobile.DeviceFilterElement.FilterClass*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name by which the evaluator will be identified.
trans-unit.target: 获取将用来标识计算器的名称。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: This property is required for both comparison and evaluator filters.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是必需的比较和计算器筛选器。

trans-unit.source: The name by which the evaluator will be identified.
trans-unit.target: 将用来标识计算器名称。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
